mapper.sql: playrecordId, customerId, deviceId, time, refId, quantity
mapper.select:
select
from playrecord where time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.insert: insert into playrecord (playrecordId, customerId, deviceId, time, refId, quantity) values (#{playrecordid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into playrecord
playrecordId,
customerId,
deviceId,
time,
refId,
quantity,

mapper.update:
update playrecord
customerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deviceId = #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
time = #{refid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where playrecordId = #{playrecordid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
